title: The Man of God and the Disobedient Prophet
summary: A prophet warns Jeroboam against idol worship at Bethel. God performs a miracle, but the prophet disobeys God's command and is killed by a lion. Jeroboam continues in sin despite the warning.

faq.question: What warning did the man of God give Jeroboam?
faq.answer: That his altar and false worship would be judged by God.

faq.question: Why was the prophet punished by death?
